title: Changes in the rhizosphere and root-associated bacteria community of white Guinea yam (Dioscorea rotundata Poir.) impacted by genotype and nitrogen fertilization
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Ayodeji Peter Idowu, Kosuke Yamamoto, Takahiko Koizumi, Minenosuke Matsutani, Kanako Takada, Yuh Shiwa, Asrat Asfaw, Ryo Matsumoto, Michel Ouyabe, Babil Pachakkil, Hidehiko Kikuno, Hironobu Shiwachi
